company.name: NorQuant Technology
company.description:
NorQuant Technology is a SaaS company that offers the fund analysis tool Prisma.

Prisma is an intuitive web-application for advanced fund analysis, designed to provide a deeper insight into fund analysis than traditional tools offer. The application is primarily aimed at professional users such as financial advisors, asset managers, fund selectors and various sales functions.

Prisma gives the user access to fund summaries, fund comparisons, rankings of funds and managers, expected returns and a portfolio tool that enables the optimization of the portfolio. The tool helps the user selecting the funds with the best chance of success in the future.

The fund screener in Prisma is one of the most comprehensive and enables, in addition to traditional parameters, to screen for more advanced data points such as our innovative solutions around fund ranking and expected return.

Prisma helps investors navigate the vast range of funds and provides a deeper insight into what drives returns in individual funds and makes it easy to optimize the portfolio to increase risk-adjusted returns. Overall, this leads to better investment decisions.
 
Features:
- Traditional and quantitative fund screener (factor based)
- Tool for comparing funds
- Create individual fund lists
- Create individual fund portfolios with optimization functionality
- Quantitative model for future returns
- Ranking of funds and managers
- Downloadable fact sheets "on-demand"
- And much more…

Also, the company is running a research project funded by the Norwegian Research Council with the title "Machine Learning for Transparent and Sustainable Investing".
